name: CopayOptionCS
title: Codes for qualifier of copay amount
description: Codes for qualifier of copay amount

concept.display: No Charge After Deductible: The consumer first pays the deductible, and after the deductible is met, no copayment is charged (this indicates that this benefit is subject to the deductible).
Deductible is not applicable: Zero-deductible cost sharing to be represented by a co-pay value of 'Not applicable' and co-insurance value of 'No charge'.
